page.title: 01SHIREBROOK ATHLETIC CLUB.
page.content: Every Tuesday at 6.00 p.m.eager young athletes gather together in the gym at Shirebrook Comprehesive to run relays and races .It costs 25p to get in then when we've paid we play Football or benchball Then we get four teams to practice our relays. We have one team at a time round the track four times against the clock.Then we go back in to the gym to do the high jump .After we play crab football, then we do races against each other,after which we have a choice of activity .Most weeks we choose to play tiggy because we like it better than football.We test the effectivness of our training when we compete against athletes from other clubs at meetings held every month.Shirebrook Athletic Club compare favourably with the standards reached by others in the area and hope one day to become the area champions.
